You can use the online contact form below, where your message will be dealt with as appropriate, or alternatively contact us on the telephone numbers below. Honorary Secretary , Peter Mahoney: Tel: 01702 526 911 You may complete this form to send an email directly to Belfairs Golf Club. Alternatively, you can send an email to the following email address: info@belfairsgolfclub.co.uk . Contact Form Name Email Phone Subject **Please select an option** Clubhouse General Membership Members Website Account Request a Handicap Certificate Visitor Message Please do not provide anything sensitive here, like health details, or your credit card number. Verification We do not support SPAM and we would never sell your information to anyone. Any correspondence is strictly confidential. We will only use the above information to contact you about your query. Address Belfairs Golf Club Eastwood Road North Leigh-on-Sea Essex SS9 4LR Contact phone: 01702 526 911 email: info@belfairsgolfclub.co.uk Tee Times phone: 01702 525 345 Links RSS Feed Cookie and Privacy Contact Us Map/Directions Copyright © Belfairs Golf Club , 2011-2025. About Us | Meet The Team | Blue Sky Villas Algarve JOIN US - Receive our sunny holiday promotions. Subscribe and get a free Premium Welcome Basket on your next holiday! SUBSCRIBE NOW Shortlist
                        ( ) Home Holiday Villas Property Management Concierge Renovations The Algarve About us Contacts Office: +351 289 356 047 rentals@blue-sky-villas.com JOIN US Recieve our sunny holiday promotions. Subscribe and get a free Premium Welcome Basket on your next holiday! SUBSCRIBE NOW About us Home > About us NICOLE Director Founder and owner of Blue Sky Villas in Algarve, Nicole has over 23 years of experience in property management and holiday rentals . In 2007, she decided that it was time to start her own company and has not looked back since. Nicole is here to make sure the company runs smoothly and that the customers and guests are happy, including you. Sidney General Manager Sidney is the youngest of the squad and is half-English, German and Portuguese. He is passionate about outdoor activities such as sailing and long hikes with Gucci – one of the office dogs. As a General Manager at Blue Sky Villas, Sidney oversees the day-to-day operations of the company, and you'll always find him greeting you with a smile. Elisa Rental Agent Straight from the "Land of the beloved sun" in Venezuela, there is no doubt Elisa feels right at home in our sunny Algarve. With a background in logistics, design and client relations, she is the perfect fit for our rental department. Her roles vary between managing clients and finding the best options to suit their needs. Elisa will treat you as uniquely as you are :)! Easy-going and a valued team worker, Elisa is our sweet Venezuelan delight. Andreia Rental Director Head of rentals, Andreia is our little firecracker! She makes sure every luxury villa guest has the best moments and enjoys their sunny holidays. The kindest-hearted person, she strives for excellence and 5-star reviews. She keeps the team calm, and as we like to say: everyone deserves an Andreia in their life! Bruna Office Manager & Concierge Phone us, and you'll hear Bruna's wonderful voice. "Blue Sky Villas, this is Bruna speaking. How can I help you?". Multi-tasker Bruna makes sure all the office administrative tasks are functioning efficiently and facilitates all communication between our departments. Not only that, but she also coordinates concierge services , helping you book your preferred restaurants, adventurous outdoor activities or in-house massages. Pay us a visit, and Bruna will welcome you with a cheerful smile. PEBBLE Office Dog Our four-legged in-house security. She lets us know of anything that moves outside the office, and she’s also great at being cuddly. Vlad Renovations Supervisor Although he might look big and scary, Vlad has got a heart of gold. Having been a Property Manager for our Blue Sky Villas luxury vacation homes for over 5 years, it only made sense for his transition to Renovations Supervisor. He has the perfect blend of knowledge, skill and experience for this new department of our business. He is hard-working, determined, and gets things done. Passionate about cars, motorbikes, and of course, renovations, Vlad will always make you laugh. Sílvia Senior Property Manager Having worked in the Algarve area for more than 9 years, Silvia has the best knowledge and skills to be our Senior Property Manager at Blue Sky Villas. She won't accept anything other than perfect, and you'll find her extremely focused on her tasks, #exterminator :'). Bubbly and dynamic, her energy levels are always up high! Xavier Head of Maintenance Pronounced "Sha-vee-air", Xavier was born in Venezuela and moved to sunny Portugal very young. Now, he has been in our team for 8 years and is a real jack-of-all-trades. Xavier guarantees that any problem you may have at your holiday villa is dealt with quickly and efficiently. Of course, it's unlikely that you will meet him, as he does a great job keeping our properties in tip-top condition. Gucci Office Dog Gucci has an unbelievable amount of energy. She will be happy to meet and greet each and every person who has the pleasure of visiting our office. Selina Marketing Director & Interior Designer Born in Munich, Selina speaks 4 languages fluently and holds a bachelor’s in education and a master’s in interior design. She has an eye for detail and is inspired by of the Algarve’s beautiful surroundings. In charge of all communication strategies, overall branding and of course, everything that makes your property look as gorgeous as it can be, Selina is the creative one in our Blue Sky Villas team. BELLA Office Dog Fairly laid-back and not one to display much emotion, she enjoys long naps. However, when you return to the office, Bella’s voice is sure to let you know how much she’s missed you. At Blue Sky Villas, we navigate the waters, capture images of culinary delights, and  explore the charming streets and beautiful beaches. We are members of a boutique property management company for vacation rentals and luxury villas in Portugal, Algarve. Blue Sky Villas is made up of a team of local employees who have a deep connection to the Portugal area. We strive to create magical moments, unforgettable memories and impeccable service for our owners and guests alike. Dedicated to exceptional service Each member of our team will go above and beyond to ensure that you have access to the best that the Algarve has to offer. From personal recommendations for local attractions and dining spots to ensuring your comfort and satisfaction throughout your stay. With our Blue Sky Villas luxury vacation homes, you can create so many memorable experiences. Whether you’re seeking relaxation, adventure, or a taste of the local culture, our team is here to help make your time in the Algarve truly special. If you have any specific questions or preferences, feel free to let us know so we can tailor our services to meet your needs. Join us Get luxury holiday inspiration and special offers straight to your inbox. Receive special offers straight to your inbox and get super savings on your upcoming holiday. Subscribe and get a free premium welcome basket on your next holiday! All rights reserved Privacy policy Complaints book

Website designed by Par Six Golf Media Manage Consent To provide the best experiences, we use technologies like cookies to store and/or access device information. Consenting to these technologies will allow us to process data such as browsing behavior or unique IDs on this site. Not consenting or withdrawing consent, may adversely affect certain features and functions. Functional Functional Always active The technical storage or access is strictly necessary for the legitimate purpose of enabling the use of a specific service explicitly requested by the subscriber or user, or for the sole purpose of carrying out the transmission of a communication over an electronic communications network. Preferences Preferences The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user. Statistics Statistics The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for statistical purposes. The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you. Marketing Marketing The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes. Pro Golf Lessons & Instruction | Golf Lessons for Kids Jacksonville, FL Membership Become a Member Reciprocal Book a Tee Time Golf Course Course Information Tee Times Golf Lessons Rates TopTracer Toptracer Range Win An After Work Party! Blue Sky Bar & Grill Bar & Grill Private Events Group Golf Events Blog Contact Book Your Tee Time 904.446.2899 1700 Monument Road, Jacksonville, FL 32225 Golf Lessons The Secret to your best game? Golf lessons In Jacksonville, FL at Blue Sky! Is there any better feeling than hitting a shot and having everything go exactly the way you envision it? We’re talking in the world of golf, of course, and we want everyone who plays our Course to experience this magic feeling. Our trademark is that we’re all about making the great game of golf enjoyable for everyone who visits us here at Blue Sky. It’s our belief that golf should be a friendly, enjoyable game. To help you get the most out of your time on the Course, we offer golf lessons in Jacksonville, FL for players at all levels. Why take Golf lessons? It’s the best way to improve your game and have more fun on the Course. Yes, you may start seeing lower scores as a result.  That’s our mission here at Blue Sky, to ensure that everyone has a good time! Golf Lessons for Kids Some of the most important lessons kids can learn are all wrapped up in the game of golf. Here at Blue Sky Golf Club, we instill not just great technique and form in our junior students, but also the life lessons that can be found out on the Course. As Jack Nicklaus said, “Golf teaches you how to behave!” Learn from Golf Pro's Who Know Kids and Love the Game Our Professional Golf Coaches teach kids and teens the basics of form and technique while providing a safe, supportive atmosphere for testing new skills. They also understand that golf isn’t just a test of skills but rather an all-encompassing sport that involves mind, body, and spirit. To that end, junior golf lessons are about confidence. After all, everyone knows you play your best game when you’re calm and focused… that takes confidence, dedication, and a certain level of passion. Our trainers have a passion for the game that shines through in everything they do. From employing state-of-the-art equipment to giving individualized attention to each student, you know they’re putting everything they have into their mission… teaching kids and teens to love the game of golf! Blue Sky Golf Club ⛳️ Book Golf Online • golfscape™ Explore Destinations Help Log In Sign Up Language Currency How can we help? How can I book a tee time? 1 Navigate to your preferred golf course. Select your date of play, tee time, rentals, and number of players – and then click Book. You will receive an instant email confirmation and your tee time will be guaranteed at the course. Can I modify or cancel a booking? 1 Absolutely! If you are within the cancellation policy of your tee time, navigate to the Manage Booking page to modify or cancel your booking. What is your cancellation policy? 1 You can typically cancel your booking for a full refund within 48 hours of your tee time, but this may vary slightly by course. Cancellation policies are defined by each golf course and are clearly marked during the entire booking process as well as in your email confirmation. Why should I book with golfscape? 1 We are the only service who’s technology operates at all our partner courses – that means tee times and rates on golfscape are sourced directly. So when you make a booking, your reservation is confirmed instantly at the golf course. How can I get more help? 1 You may communicate with us anytime using the button below or email us at [email protected] – we’re happy to help! Contact us Get Started Create Account or sign up with Log In Forgot Password? Whether you choose to come out and perfect your game on our lighted driving range, play 18 holes of championship golf or just play one of our unique 9-hole golf options, Blue Sky welcomes all to come out enjoy our new relaxed golfing atmosphere! About Us — Blue Sky Sports & Entertainment 0 Skip to Content Our Talent Current Roster In Memoriam Talent We've Worked With Our Services Our Work About Blog Careers BOOK TALENT  ➺ Open Menu Close Menu Our Talent Current Roster In Memoriam Talent We've Worked With Our Services Our Work About Blog Careers BOOK TALENT  ➺ Open Menu Close Menu Folder: Our Talent Back Current Roster In Memoriam Talent We've Worked With Our Services Our Work About Blog Careers BOOK TALENT  ➺ ABOUT OUR AGENCY Who We Are At Blue Sky Sports and Entertainment, we are a dynamic team of passionate professionals dedicated to the world of sports and entertainment. With decades of experience, we specialize in creating memorable experiences from major sporting events to intimate entertainment gatherings. We are driven by a love for the industry and a commitment to excellence, ensuring that every project we undertake is a true reflection of our client's vision. What Makes Us Unique Our commitment to excellence means we meticulously match the right talent with your event and business needs. From securing renowned athletes and high-profile celebrities to engaging industry-leading speakers, we ensure that every booking enhances the success of your occasion. BOOK TALENT “In 2003 when I launched Blue Sky Sports & Entertainment, my objective was to create a company that was committed to providing my clients with the best possible service.  In order to accomplish this, I continually rely on my core beliefs of not just treating the services we provide as a business, but by giving each and every client my personal attention and always putting their best interest first.  I pride myself on handling every client and opportunity in a professional manner, with integrity and honesty.” Founder/CEO 781.421.3025 EXPLORE ALL TALENT MENU Home About Our Talent Our Services Our Work Careers Book Talent SERVICES Talent Representation Spokesperson/Endorsements Sponsorships NIL Licensing Event Management Influencer Activation Appearances/Performances/ Speaking Engagements CONTACT kzayotti@blueskyse.com 150 Washington Street Norwell, MA 02061 CONNECT SUBSCRIBE TO OUR NEWSLETTER TO RECEIVE NEWS AND UPDATES Email Address Sign Up Thank you! Blue Sky Sports & Entertainment is a comprehensive talent booking, sports marketing, and event management firm that connects sports and entertainment talent with organizations and individuals planning events. We handle all aspects of talent procurement, marketing endorsements, media representation, event management, NIL licensing, and sports marketing consulting. With our expertise in managing details and creating memorable experiences, we ensure your events and brands are truly unforgettable. Copyright 2025—Blue Sky Sports & Entertainment, LLC  | Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

About Us – BlueSky Education Skip to content Home About Us Destinations Menu Toggle Singapore Australia Malaysia Japan Vietnam China Thailand South Korea News & Media More Menu Toggle Blog Gallery Testimonials BROCHURE WHATSAPP ENQUIRE Main Menu Home About Us Home About Us Destinations Menu Toggle Singapore Australia Malaysia Japan Vietnam China Thailand South Korea News & Media More Menu Toggle Blog Gallery Testimonials Brochures Whatsapp Registration Our Story BlueSky Education is an international EduXperience pioneer and Asia-Pacific’s leading provider of Study Tours. We imbue students and young adults with real, global future-ready skills, along with access to international education and career opportunities. Driven by core educational values, our programmes offer valuable exposure and in-depth cultural orientation for learners of diverse abilities. Fusing differing nationalities and backgrounds, the opportunity for networking and educational leveraging is vast and infinite. Our students are constantly motivated to critique, re-invent and discover; honing functional communication, management and social skills. BlueSky Education nurtures the intellectual, cognitive and sensory faculties of students; preparing them for their foray into the 21st century and beyond. Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Operating in Australia, Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Vietnam, and the Philippines, our programmes have attracted over 65,000 students globally . BlueSky EduXperience programmes are specifically crafted to provide life-enriching experiences, guiding students towards discovering how to Be Future Ready! Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Send Data Meet the Team Group Management Team Andy Group Chief Executive Officer Andy Group Chief Executive Officer Andy's expertise spans operational leadership, management consulting, and franchising. In education, he has navigated growth from early-stage to high-growth enterprises, serving diverse age groups from K-12 to adult executive education.
His prior roles include General Manager for the Asia-Pacific region at global English school Helen Doron, Managing Director (Asia-Pacific) at UK publisher Pearson Education, and Operations Director at Wall Street English overseeing over 100 Asia-Pacific branches.
Andy's leadership philosophy is built on empowering individuals, fostering collaboration, and championing open communication and empathy. 17 years of experience in K-12 and executive education across Asia Beyond the boardroom, Andy prioritizes family time and personal growth, indulging in self-development, swimming, and golf. As Group CEO of BlueSky Education, He is dedicated to leveraging expertise and passion for transformative change, with an unwavering commitment to positively impact our industry and the lives of those we serve. Let's chart a course toward unparalleled success and meaningful impact together. Jessica Director Jessica Director Jessica is deeply passionate about international education, having experienced the full journey of cross-border learning herself. She has a profound appreciation for how exposure to diverse cultures and countries can profoundly expand one's perspective and unlock amazing global education and career opportunities. Her time as an international student at the University of Southern California in the United States, in particular, has shaped her globally-minded perspective. Additionally, Jessica holds a dual-bachelor's degree in Business Management and Finance from the National University of Singapore and the University of Southern California (USA). Currently based in Singapore, Jessica lives with her husband, two young sons, and their beloved golden retriever, Jake. When not dedicated to her work, she enjoys the tranquillity of yoga, the rejuvenation of swimming, and the enrichment of travelling the world. Mai General Manager Mai General Manager Mai is an experienced education and business development professional with over 15 years of work experience in the USA, Singapore and Australia. She's worked with top global educational institutions such as National University of Singapore (NUS) and INSEAD business school, in recruitment, business development, built and grown educational ventures. Mai holds an MBA degree from Macquarie Business School (Australia) and a Certificate in Global Management from INSEAD Business School (France/Singapore). Since the inception, Mai has been a member of the founding team at BlueSky Education. She currently lives in Sydney and manages the BlueSky Education Australia team to deliver best-in-class innovative & thematic study tours for high school and corporate clients from overseas. 17 Years Experience in Education and Business Development Professional In her free time, Mai enjoys yoga and cooking. The physical and mindful practice of yoga helps her stay fit and relax. She also takes pleasure in the creativity and sharing involved in cooking. Australia Team Linda Academic Manager Linda Academic Manager Linda has gained extensive experience over the course of 16 years in the education sector, focusing on teaching, coaching, mentoring and curriculum design. Her main area of expertise lies in enhancing teacher competencies in English language acquisition. In addition to her work in education, she has also made contributions to human resources, with a focus on improving employee engagement and development. Linda has proven adept at tailoring educational programs for diverse audiences, including primary, secondary and international students with varying linguistic backgrounds. Her broad experience has equipped her with the skills to monitor progress, drive continuous improvement and lead learning and development initiatives. 16 Years Experience In Education Sector 3 Years Experience In Human Resources Sector Linda is the proud mother of three wonderful children who consistently keep her and her husband on their toes. Their family is enthusiastic about travelling and immersing themselves in the diverse cultures of our incredible world. During her leisure time, Linda enjoys maintaining an active lifestyle by attending the gym and participating in outdoor activities. Monica Operations Manager Monica Operations Manager Monica is a highly skilled Study Tours Operations Manager with a wealth of expertise in tourism management. With a profound understanding of the intricacies of the industry, she excels in orchestrating seamless study tour experiences for participants. Monica's background in tourism, coupled with her passion for education and travel, positions her as a dedicated professional in shaping transformative study tour journeys. 4 Years Experience In Hospitality and Tourism Combined A dedicated woman driven by love for her family and passion for her work, seeking to make meaningful contributions to both spheres of her life. Laura LATAM Sales Manager Laura LATAM Sales Manager Laura Araujo brings over 14 years of experience in the education sector , having worked as both an English teacher and coordinator for a big language center franchise in Brazil. Laura spent six years living in Australia, where she deepened her expertise by studying Business Management and teaching English to students from diverse cultural and professional backgrounds. In 2022, she joined BlueSky as Academic Manager and Business Developer, contributing to both academic excellence and business growth. Now back in Brazil, Laura leads as the LATAM Sales Manager, focused on expanding BlueSky’s presence and building strong relationships across the region. Outside of work, Laura’s passion for movement and creativity shines through — she graduated as a classical ballerina in 2007 and has never left the dance floor since. A former drummer in several bands, Laura’s artistic side reflects her creative and dynamic personality. Today, she finds balance by staying active through dance, yoga, swimming, and gym sessions, always aligning her physical well-being with mental health and family life. Vietnam Team Alice Partnership Director Alice Partnership Director Chuong Student Recruitment Manager Chuong Student Recruitment Manager With over 10 years of experience in the education field, Pham Thai Chuong is dedicated to sharing his expertise and supporting clients in designing and coordinating impactful educational programs. As the Vietnam Recruitment Manager at BlueSky Education, Chuong leverages his strong background in teaching and curriculum development to help students boost their learning paths and empower clients to meet their educational objectives. 10 Years Experience In Education Sector China Team Matthew Chief Representative of China Matthew Chief Representative of China As the Chief Representative and founding team member of Blue Sky Education in China, I bring nearly two decades of expertise in the education sector, specializing in brand strategy, product innovation, market expansion, and cultivating relationships with high-net-worth clients. My role centers on spearheading the growth and localization of Blue Sky’s bespoke educational programs in China, ensuring they align with the needs of students seeking transformative global learning experiences. Driven by an unwavering passion for education and a deep sense of social responsibility, I am committed to designing and delivering programs that empower students to broaden their international horizons, pursue their passions with courage, and take ownership of their futures. Education, to me, is not just a career—it is a lifelong mission to inspire individuals to unlock their potential and thrive in an interconnected world. Beyond my professional endeavors, I cherish moments spent with my family, finding joy in simple, meaningful connections. An avid traveler and cultural explorer, I immerse myself in diverse communities worldwide, savoring local cuisines and studying innovative educational practices. These experiences fuel my vision of integrating global excellence into Blue Sky’s offerings, ensuring every student gains access to the finest educational opportunities. I believe education is the cornerstone of personal and societal progress. Through Blue Sky Education, I strive to bridge cultures, ignite curiosity, and equip students with the tools to navigate and shape a dynamic world—one life-changing journey at a time. Why Choose Us Our Programmes Our flagship Public Speaking & Leadership programme focuses predominantly on verbal
communication in English. In addition, we also have bespoke programmes in each country, 
 ranging from Green Technology and Robotics in Singapore to Sustainable Future and STEM
in Australia. There is something for everyone at BlueSky Education! Teachers All teachers at BlueSky Education are qualified and experienced in their subject, ensuring that students get the most out of their classes. We also provide access to top university faculty members and students upon request. Accommodation We can offer university and boarding school full-board accommodation, giving students an immersive study-abroad experience. Homestay options are also available in Australia to fully immerse students in local everyday life. Skills At the end of the programme, students come away with not only educational and cultural
experience but also return home with life skills that they can take forward throughout their lives. Some of the skills students learn to include resilience skills, leadership and teamwork, time management, confidence in communication, resourcefulness, responsibility, and how to be independent. We even teach them basic first aid skills! Culture Being open and embracing new cultures is an important part of life, especially as more and more people consider themselves citizens of the world. Students learn about local cultures, foods, religions, and practices via varied excursions. Students also participate in cultural workshops and exchange programmes with local students (subject to availability). Empower your students to reach their educational goals while exploring a foreign destination!
